name: Wizard Sports
description:
Made for the Idle Wizard Jam.

A game of strategy and spellcasting and action and injokes and sports.

Cast spells! Kick balls! Tackle enemies to the ground, then kick their balls! Score goals to save humanity!

New for version 1.1:

  • Revised tutorial
  • Improved selection UI
  • Survival mode
  • Source code!

Controls

Left mouse - select characters, give them orders, shoot the ball if you have it, cast spells

Right click - Deselects, also used for targetting for some spells

WASD - Active controls for the currently selected character

Q - Selects the character nearest to the ball

E- Selects the character nearest to the cursor

Space - Pause/Unpause the game
